name: Curtiss-Wright Corporation
description: Curtiss-Wright Corporation is a diversified multinational company that provides highly engineered, mission-critical components and services to the aerospace, defense, and industrial markets. Founded in 1929, the company has a rich history of innovation and technological advancement. Curtiss-Wright operates through three primary segments: Defense, Commercial/Industrial, and Power. The Defense segment offers a range of products including advanced aerospace components, and controls, as well as integrated solutions for military platforms. The Commercial/Industrial segment supplies motion control products, valves, and pumps used in various industrial applications, while the Power segment focuses on providing products and services for the global energy sector, particularly nuclear power. With a commitment to quality and reliability, Curtiss-Wright leverages its engineering expertise to meet the evolving needs of its customers in highly regulated environments. The company emphasizes the importance of innovation and operational excellence, investing significantly in research and development to remain at the forefront of technology in its fields. As a trusted partner to leading defense and industrial organizations, Curtiss-Wright plays a critical role in ensuring the safety and effectiveness of complex systems across the globe.
